transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Sir namaskar gaurav baat kar raha tha sir india mart se
Customer: Ji bataiye
Executive: Sir abhi aap se baat hua tha na wo meeting pe abhi
Customer: Ji ji
Executive: Sir wo abhi mere pass feedback aaya hua tha aapne sir wo not satisfied ka de diya hua hai
Customer: Ji ji
Executive: To usme kya
Customer: Ha to kya issue aa raha hai sir wahi main janna chah raha tha sir
Customer: Ji service to nahi liya mujhe lag raha hai mujhe 1% bhi benefit nahi ho raha hai
Executive: Sir dekho uske liye aap plan aur purchase kar lijiye main purchase kar main to purchase kar lu lakh sir dekho main purchase purchase wali baat wo samajh gaya aapki baat dekho purchase karne ke liye koi
Executive: Bhi aapko nahi bola aapko team suggest karti hai ki sir aapne agar dekho aap pattern use kar rahe ho aap all india deal kar rahe ho to all india me deal karne to waha pe company dikhni chahiye is wajah se team ne suggest kiya aapko aisa kuch nahi hai ki aapko bole ki ye le lo service theek hai main aapko pehle ye cheez clear karu dusri cheez aapki service me maine bataya ki aapka aap jo locally hardoi me deal kar rahe ho jo aapke category already usme main add karwa dunga jaise aapke ek category me single single product add hai jaise aapka GPS tracking hai isme ek hi product add hai GPS tracking ke aur aapka GPS tracking device hai isme single product add hai to wo main aapka isme yaha pe char char product add karwata hu kam se kam jisme aapke pass buyer search kare to us product se bhi inquiries aapke pass aaye
Customer: Ji ji
Executive: Baki uske liye main aapko bolta raha hu aapko aisa nahi hai ki team aapko force kare upgrade ke liye uske liye nahi force kar rahi hai aapko sirf suggest kare dekho suggestion hamara kam hai karna na karna aapka hi kam hai sir
Customer: Aapko lagta hai aap mere se aap jaldi test kar pate
Executive: Kya cheez
Customer: Aap mere se hote to aap jaldi test kar pate
Executive: Nahi dekho sir bilkul nahi kar pata maine aapko wahi bola main aap se isliye maine aap se discuss kiya maine yahi pucha tha ki business aapko mil raha india mart se ki nahi aapne bola nahi abhi business nahi mila mujhe india mart se maine aapko kya bola aap use kijiye koi baat nahi upgrade mat karaiye maine aapko yahi to bola tha ki aap upgrade mat karao abhi aap pehle use karo aapko ye GPS tracking hai iski leads aap consume karo aap se dealing puchi maine kahan kahan karte ho but aapne agar dekho business me wahi aapne first time india mart aur jab aap invest kiya kuch ROI niklega to hi aap aage invest karne ka sochoge sir simple sa business ka yhi funda hota hai ki agar acha main kahin pe investment kar raha hu ROI mil raha hai to main aur waha pe kyu na jyada investment karu sir business ka yhi funda hota hai ab waha pe aap se maine pucha aapne bola nahi ROI nahi mila hai to us pe hum work karte hain pehle aapko jo bhi category maine aapko bola category hum proper ek bar karwata hu aap se ansika se jo aapke account handle karti hai main ansika ko proper bol ke aapka catalog correct karta hu jo bhi aapki category me single single product add hai na usme main aapka add on karata hu product teen teen product jaise aapka vehicle GPS system hai isme aapke teen product add hai aapka G70h vehicle GPS ho gaya aapka PS 25 ho gaya aise karke teen product aapne add kar rakhe hain to kya hota hai buyer jo search karta hai wo aapke product ke naam se category ke naam se search karta hai ab waha pe agar wo category ya product hamare pass add hoga to waha pe catalog dikhega buyer ko agar wo category hamare pass add hi nahi hogi to buyer waha tak direct approach kar hi nahi payega hamare
Customer: To aap aisa kariye main keh raha hu main kal main apni to aap karwa dijiye main dekh raha hu bye bye
Executive: Theek hai
Executive: To aap batao kal ek bar aap system pe aao main khud aapke isme pura catalog correct karwa deta hu aap batao kal kitne baje free rahoge
Customer: Sir main aapko karta hu
Executive: Theek hai
Executive: Theek hai
Executive: Theek hai sir
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting benefits from service.

- Customer wants catalog correction.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of category visibility.

- Executive offered to correct the catalog.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call the executive tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- catalog, gps, product, category, roi
